weRecycleToSavePlanet: We recycle to save the planet
description: Connects companies that need to dispose of recyclable waste with recycling enterprises.
footerText: We help businesses and individuals reduce waste volume by turning recyclable materials into new resources.
aboutUsText: This is an environmental project aimed at creating an efficient system for waste collection, sorting, and recycling. We help businesses and individuals reduce waste volume and transform recyclable materials into new resources.
aboutUs1: Organize convenient waste collection through recycling drop-off points.
aboutUs2: Implement eco-friendly solutions for businesses and residential complexes.
aboutUs3: Raise awareness about recycling through educational programs.
aboutUs4: Collaborate with recycling enterprises for effective waste utilization.
ourMission: Our mission is a world without excess waste!
downloadPresentationGetFamiliar: Download the presentation and learn about our company’s activities
fromWasteToNewProductsText1: In the first six months of 2024, 270,000 tons out of 5.2 million tons of waste were recycled, accounting for 5.2% of the total volume.
fromWasteToNewProductsText2: These figures indicate a serious issue with plastic waste disposal.
fromWasteToNewProductsText3:
In Uzbekistan, approximately 27.9 thousand tons of solid household waste are generated daily, of which about 2.87 thousand tons are plastic.
Only about 5.2% of this waste is recycled, averaging 150 tons of plastic per day. The rest (more than 2.7 thousand tons) is sent to landfills or incinerated.
whatWasteRecycledInto: What are plastic wastes recycled into?
contactWithUsSub: Leave a request, and our managers will get in touch with you.
chooseUs: Choose Wasteless to develop Uzbekistan’s circular economy!
chooseUsSub: Our main goal is to maximize the share of waste recycling by creating an IT platform for efficient collection and utilization of recyclables.
